custom-sql.sql: SELECT categorydataid as masterdataid ,'C-'||categorydataid as referenceid, categoryvalue as value , 'C-'||categoryvalue as code_ FROM category;
SELECT subcategoryid as masterdataid , subcategoryvalue as value , 'SC-'||subcategoryvalue as code_ , 'SC-'||subcategoryid as referenceid FROM subcategory where categoryid = ? ;
SELECT typeid as masterdataid ,'C-'||typeid as referenceid, 'C-'||typevalue as code_, typevalue as value FROM type;
SELECT deliverymodeid as masterdataid , 'C-'||deliverymodeid as referenceid, 'C-'||deliverymodevalue as code_, deliverymodevalue as value FROM deliverymode;
SELECT filecodeid as masterdataid , 'C-'||filecodeid as referenceid, 'C-'||filecodevalue as code_, filecodevalue as value FROM filecode;
SELECT basicheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||basicheadid as referenceid , basicheadvalue as value , basicheadcode as code_ FROM basichead;
SELECT primaryheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||primaryheadid as referenceid , primaryheadvalue as value , primaryheadcode as code_ FROM primaryhead where basicheadid = ?;
SELECT secondaryheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||primaryheadid as referenceid , secondaryheadvalue as value , secondaryheadcode as code_ FROM secondaryhead where primaryheadid = ?;
SELECT teritaryheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||teritaryheadid as referenceid , tertiaryheadvalue as value , tertiaryheadcode as code_ FROM tertiaryhead where secondaryheadid = ?;
SELECT organizationid as masterdataid , 'C-'||organizationid as referenceid , organizationvalue as value , organizationcode as code_ FROM organization ;
SELECT suborganizationid as masterdataid , 'C-'||suborganizationid as referenceid ,'C-'||suborganizationvalue as code_ , suborganizationvalue as value FROM suborganization where organizationid = ?;
SELECT receiptcategoryid as masterdataid , 'C-'||receiptcategoryid as referenceid , 'C-'||receiptcategoryvalue as code_ , receiptcategoryvalue as value FROM receiptcategory;

SELECT receiptsubcategoryid as masterdataid , 'C-'||receiptsubcategoryid as referenceid , 'C-'||receiptsubcategoryvalue as code_ , receiptsubcategoryvalue as value FROM receiptsubcategory where receiptcategoryid = ?;
SELECT countryid as masterdataid , 'C-'||countryid as referenceid , countryvalue as value , countrycode as code_ FROM masterdatacountry ;
SELECT stateid as masterdataid , 'C-'||stateid as referenceid , statecode as code_ ,statevalue as value FROM masterdatastate where countryid = ?;
SELECT basicheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||basicheadid as referenceid , basicheadvalue as value , basicheadcode as code_ FROM basichead where basicheadid = ? ;
SELECT primaryheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||primaryheadid as referenceid , primaryheadvalue as value , primaryheadcode as code_ FROM primaryhead where primaryheadid = ?;
SELECT secondaryheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||primaryheadid as referenceid , secondaryheadvalue as value , secondaryheadcode as code_ FROM secondaryhead where secondaryheadid = ?;
SELECT teritaryheadid as masterdataid , 'C-'||teritaryheadid as referenceid , tertiaryheadvalue as value , tertiaryheadcode as code_ FROM tertiaryhead where teritaryheadid = ?;
SELECT categoryid as masterdataid , 'C-'||categoryid as referenceid , categoryvalue as value , categoryvalue as code_ FROM jet_process_docfile INNER JOIN category ON categorydataid = categoryid
